title: Pixel Pro Digital & Film Camera 100M Wireless Shutter Remote Control Release for Canon EOS 60D 1000D 550d 500D 450D 400D 350D 300D Powershot Pentax Samsung Contax , replaces Canon RS-60E3
description: Pixel RW-221 is a high performance wireless shutter remote control and supports single, continuous, bulb, and 4s delay shooting mode. It can control multi receivers and cameras. RW-221 uses the FSK system and the world wide free 2.4GHz frequency (FSK modulation is used to improve the reliability and stability of the product). You can also use it on a different brand or make of camera simply by ordering a new connecting cable. RW-221/E3 is compatible with Canon EOS 1000D, 100D, 1100D, 300D, 350D, 400D, 450D, 500D, 550D, 600D, 60D, 60Da, 650D, 700D, Kiss Digital, Kiss F Digital, Kiss N, Kiss X2 ,Kiss X3, Kiss X4, Kiss X5, Kiss X50, Kiss X6, PowerShot G1 X, PowerShot G10, PowerShot G11, PowerShot G12, PowerShot G15, PowerShot SX50 HS, Rebel SL1, Rebel T1i, Rebel T2i, Rebel T3, Rebel T3i, Rebel T4i, Rebel XS, Rebel XSi, Rebel XT, Rebel XTi, Revel T5i, Contax 645, Contax N, Contax N Digital, Contax N1, Contax NX, FujiFilm X-E1, Hasselblad H, Hasselblad H3D, Hasselblad H4D-200MS, Hasselblad H4D-31, Hasselblad H4D-40, Hasselblad H4D-50, Hasselblad H4D-50MS, Hasselblad H4D-60, Pentax 645D, Pentax ist D, Pentax ist DL, Pentax ist DL2, Pentax ist DS, Pentax ist DS2, Pentax K-30, Pentax K-5, Pentax K-7, Pentax K-m, Pentax K10 Grand Prix, Pentax K100D, Pentax K100D Super, Pentax K10D, Pentax K110D, Pentax K200D, Pentax K20D, Pentax MZ-6, Pentax MZ-L, Pentax ZX-L, Samsung GX-1L, Samsung GX-1S, Samsung GX-20, Samsung NX-10, Samsung NX-100, Samsung NX-11, Samsung NX-5, Sigma SD1, Sigma SD1 Merrill, Sigma SD15.
